name: Jumping Jack Inferno
description:
Jumping Jack Inferno is a NES style retro platformer!

Adventure through the zones and watch out for those old flames!

Make sure to watch your time or you may lose your mind! (Or a life maybe)

Collect coins and get the key to advance to the next level!

Its either jump or burn, but now its YOUR turn to play as Jumping Jack Inferno!

Controls:

left / right arrow keys - move left/ right

spacebar - jump

esc key - pause (in levels)

x key - start (when prompted)

Made with Unity!

There are 2 bugs that I know of...

1) you can't quit the game (was originally only going to be a web gl game but ported it to win, mac and linux and forgot to add an exit game button

2) sometimes the player will get "stuck" walking in place. To fix either walk the opposite way then the way you want to go, if that doesn't work then jump, when you land you should be able to walk normal again (not sure why this happens from time to time)
